education_text.0: Viterbi attended the      Boston Latin School Boston Latin School, and then entered      Massachusetts Institute of Technology Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) in 1952, studying electrical engineeringAfter receiving his PhD, he applied successfully for an academic position at      University of California, Los Angeles University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA)Viterbi was later a professor of electrical engineering at UCLA and      University of California, San Diego University of California, San Diego (UCSD)Viterbi was later a professor of electrical engineering at UCLA and      University of California, San Diego University of California, San Diego (UCSD)He is also on the Board of Trustees at      redirect    The Scripps Research Institute The Scripps Research Institute
